product_name: Hi-Tec Alchemy Lite Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy your hike even if it's rainy, muddy or damp. The women's Hi-Tec Alchemy Lite Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots will keep your feet dry and comfortable. Waterproof uppers are made of suede and high-performance mesh. Moisture-wicking linings help keep feet dry from the inside out. Ghillie and double-eyelet lacing system secures the fit. Heel arm ensures a secure heel lock. Cushioning Ortholite insoles are anti-odor and antimicrobial. EVA layer between the footbed and midsole adds comfort. Lightweight, high-performance fork shank gives just-right flexibility and stability. The rugged rubber outsoles on the Hi-Tec Alchemy Lite Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots for women handle any terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy your hike even if it's rainy, muddy or damp. The women's Hi-Tec Alchemy Lite Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots will keep your feet dry and comfortable.
